casebody.data:
James W. ROCKWELL, Jr.
v.
Donate S. ROCKWELL, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 24, 2018

John R. Williams, in support of the petition.

Raymond J. Plouffe, Jr., in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 373, 175 A.3d 1249 (2017), is denied.
